name: Nonso Amadi
description: '''Chinonso Obinna Amadi''' {{Audio|LL-Q33578 (ibo)-Chinwoke 01-Chinonso Obinna Amadi.wav|Listen|help=no}}  (born September 1, 1995) is a [[Nigerian]] singer, songwriter and music producer. He is a self-taught songwriter and music producer who embarked on his music career in 2012, while at [[Covenant University]], where he studied chemical engineering. He is signed to UMG Canada, [[Def Jam Recordings]], [[Universal Music Group Nigeria|UMG Nigeria]], [[Polydor Records|Polydor]], and MCA Records France.
